text: Margarita Zavala de Calderón (; born Margarita Ester Zavala Gómez del Campo on 25 July 1967) is a Mexican lawyer and politician. She is the wife of the former President of Mexico Felipe Calderón. She served as the First Lady of Mexico during her husband's tenure. Zavala also ran as an independent candidate for the presidency of Mexico between 12 October 2017 and 16 May 2018 during the 2018 election cycle. ==References== ==Other websites== * Yo con México - Campaign website * Margarita Zavala Gómez del Campo - Presidencia de la República (Calderón Administration) Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies and Gentlemen of Mexico Category:Mexican lawyers Category:Politicians from Mexico City
title: Margarita Zavala
